---
title: "RSYC tiles - interactive map"
---

```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r echo=F, message=F}
library(RSYC)
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(leaflet)

RSYC_tiles <- read_sf(system.file("extdata", "RSYC_tiles.gpkg", package = "RSYC"))

tiles_ll <- RSYC_tiles %>%
  st_make_valid() %>%
  st_transform(4326) 

# pal <- colorFactor("Set3", domain = tiles_ll$tile_id)

leaflet(tiles_ll, options = leafletOptions(minZoom = 2)) |>
addProviderTiles("CartoDB.Positron") |>
addPolygons(
# fillColor = ~pal(TileID),
weight = 1, color = "#555", fillOpacity = 0.5,
label = ~TileID,            # hover shows ID
popup = ~paste0("<b>Tile ID: </b>", TileID),  # click shows ID
highlightOptions = highlightOptions(weight = 2, color = "#000", bringToFront = TRUE)
)

```
